ElderAssist ElderAssist Welcome to ElderAssist, your companion for effortless navigation, communication, and health tracking! Explore tutorials, maps, medication scan and AI Chat designed to simplify your daily life. Illustration of navigating with maps Tutorial example for sending text messages Explore Features 💡 Tip: Use the "Scan" button to capture and analyze information on the go. 🗺️ Navigate seamlessly with the integrated map to find your desired locations. 🎥 Tutorials: Access helpful videos on essential tools and services directly within the app. 📞 Chat: Instantly connect with our assistant for help and support. Search Cancel Tutorial Videos Search ElderAssist Video Navigate to Home Navigate to Videos Navigate to Blogs Navigate to Profile Navigate to Settings Type your message Send Frequently Asked Questions Welcome to use ElderAssist AI Chat! I am ChatElder. How can I help you today? 1.How do I find medication Information? 2.Can you show me a travel plan for this year? 3.What customer support options are available? back
